name: Kurukshetra: Ascension
description:
'Kurukshetra: Ascension' is a strategy game featuring iconic heroes and champions of India's mythology - shoot down your enemies as Arjuna, the Divine Archer, or smash them to oblivion as Bheem, the Savage Lion.

Earn hundreds of unique cards, unlock synergies and outplay your opponents in thrilling online duels. Battle mythical monsters and ancient Gods in a legendary campaign of ascension where your decisions determine the fate of the universe.

EASY TO LEARN, HARD TO MASTER: 
The game will always match your desired complexity. Start with simple decks and explore the depth of our unique card synergies and spells.

CLIMB THE RANKS: 
Outplay opponents from around the world and gain Dharma as you rise up the ladder, from Bronze to Master. Additionally, gain exclusive rewards in our weekly ranked gauntlets.

ASCEND TO THE HEAVENS:
Experience a rich PvE campaign where you immerse yourself in a dense world full of Gods, heroes and magical creatures. Will you conquer the realms with Arjuna, Bheem, Bhishma, Surpanakha, or Sugriva?

FREE TO PLAY:
Every card and spell in this game is attainable for free through grinding or chests. We believe a player's success should be defined by their skill, not their wallet.
